summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 31200, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the laying off, extending, altering, widening and establishing of Alaska Street, from Thirty-second Avenue South to Thirty-fifth Avenue South; of Thirty-second Avenue South from Edmunds Street to Alaska Street, and of Thirty-fifth Avenue South from Edmunds Street to Alaska Street; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the entire cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment, on the property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law;" approved April 23rd, 1913 and published April 26th, 1913.
